full_summary:
### Multiple Spares for Victoria-class Submarines

#### Tender Details:

| Tender ID                                | PW-22-01014579          |
|-------------------------------------------|--------------------------|
| Solicitation Number                      | W8482-230962/A          |
| Tender Closing Date                      | January 25, 2023, 2:00 PM |
| Tender Status                            | Expired                  |

#### Overview:

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the procurement of spare parts for Victoria-class submarines from qualified suppliers. A detailed list of required items, including quantities and NCAGE codes, is included in this tender package.

#### Required Items:

| Item # | GSIN Code | NSN | Description                                                    | Quantity       | NCAGE Code       |
|--------|-----------|------|----------------------------------------------------------------|----------------|------------------|
| 1      | N4730     | 99-1558800 | TEE, PIPE                                                                | 1 EA            | K1806, K6451    |
| 2      | N4810     | 99-7301391 | VALVE, SOLENOID                                                   | 3 EA            | U3341, L6427    |
| 3      | N4810     | 99-7301391 | VALVE, SOLENOID                                                   | 1 EA            | U3341, L6427    |
| 4      | N5330     | 99-9722008 | GASKET                                                              | 15 EA           | U1068, K4244, F7700 |
| 5      | N5330     | 99-9722008 | GASKET                                                              | 10 EA           | U1068, K4244, F7700 |
| 6      | N4730     | 99-8704639 | TEE, PIPE                                                                | 1 EA            | K1806, K6451    |
| 7      | N4730     | 99-8704639 | TEE, PIPE                                                                | 1 EA            | K1806, K6451    |
| 8      | N5930     | 99-7300342 | SWITCH, PRESSURE                                                      | 2 EA            | U0995            |
| 9      | N5930     | 99-7300342 | SWITCH, PRESSURE                                                      | 1 EA            | U0995            |

#### Additional Requirements:

* Bidders
